response.overview: A family discovers that dark spirits have invaded their home after their son inexplicably falls into an endless sleep. When they reach out to a professional for help, they learn things are a lot more personal than they thought.
response.tagline: It's not the House that's Haunted.
response.title: Insidious

titles.title: วิญญาณตามติด
อินซิเดียส
